::Orchestra/Triggerhappy/Skullgrin::

        Orchestra was ready to get in action, but he didn't comprehend the
situation.

         "Um, Sir, if you don't mind my asking, what is the current
situation?" He asked kindly, trying not to sound stupid.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
          Triggerhappy fired his gun at the ground left of Condor, then the
right, trying to scare Condor.

           "You better watch what you do or say, or else next time I'll
shoot for the center!" He said.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
           Skullgrin transformed back to robot mode.  He was hit by
Cheetor's blades, and tumbled back a bit, then he was hit by Hot Rod's
missiles, and went flying back, then hit the ground.  At least in robot mode
he could take a cold and logical approach to battle instead of going brawns
over brains.  He decided to go to where he could detect Triggerhappy from
far away, and go back to the temporary Decepticon base.
